qas.question: How long is the Marzilibah funicular?
What is the second shortest public railway in Europe?
What is the shortest public railway in Europe?

context: <a0_0>A funicular railway<a0_0/> leads from the Marzili district to the Bundeshaus. The <a2_0>Marzilibahn<a2_0/> funicular is, with a length of <a1_0>106 m<a1_0/> (348 ft), the second shortest public railway in Europe after the <a3_0>Zagreb funicular<a3_0/>.
